sourcesContent:
/**
 * STORE/INDEX.JS - State Management Setup
 * 
 * Vuex Store: Centralized place to store app data
 * Instead of passing data through many components, we store it here
 * 
 * Modules (organized by feature):
 * - auth: User login/logout, tokens, current user
 * - projects: Projects and tasks data
 */

import Vue from 'vue'
import Vuex from 'vuex'
import auth from './modules/auth'
import projects from './modules/projects'

Vue.use(Vuex)

export default new Vuex.Store({
  modules: {
    auth,      // Authentication state
    projects   // Projects and tasks state
  }
})
